casebody.data:
AKRON BAR ASSN.
v.
TUCKER 2017-1739 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 21, 2019

DISCIPLINARY CASE

On respondent's application for termination of probation. Respondent has substantially complied with Gov.Bar R. V(21)(D) and with this court's order dated July 10, 2018. Probation of respondent, Jon David Tucker, Attorney Registration No. 0068817, last known business address in Tallmadge, Ohio, terminated.
